Welcome to my personal website! I am a PhD candidate at the Vienna University of Economics and Business. 

My research interests are in applied econometrics, robustness testing, and replication. The papers I have written mainly focus on regression discontinuity designs.

## Research

### Working Papers
- Albada, M. R. (2024). Comment on “why high-order polynomials should not be used in regression discontinuity designs”. OSF preprint. <https://doi.org/10.31219/osf.io/547hp>.

- Albada, M. R. (2024). Overfitting in regression discontinuity designs: A reconsideration of global and local models. OSF preprint. <https://doi.org/10.31219/osf.io/8depx>.
